RECITALS   A At the Borrower's request or application, the Bank has offered the loan/financing, credit or banking  facility/facilities described in the Bank's letter of offer referred to in Schedule 2 of this Agreement)  which the Borrower has accepted and subject to the terms and conditions contained in the letter of  offer and hereinafter appearing,   B The Bank and the Borrower are entering into this Agreement to confirm the Borrower's acceptance  of the offer made by the Bank in the letter of offer mentioned above and to provide for other matters  in respect of the loan/financing, credit or banking facility/facilities offered in such letter of offer and  other related matters and to formalise the agreement between the Bank and the Borrower in  respect of such loan/financing, credit or banking facility/facilities.   C The Bank may, from time to time after the date of this Agreement at the Borrower's request or  application, if the Bank deems fit, issue any further or other letter of offer to the Borrower to offer  additional, further or other loan/financing, credit or banking facility/facilities on terms, among  others, that:    (i) this Agreement shall govern such additional, further or other loan/financing, credit or  banking facility/facilities; and/or    (ii) this Agreement is to be (or deemed to be) the principal or primary instrument for such  additional, further or other loan(s)/ financing, credit or banking facility/ facilities; and/or    (iii) this Agreement is to be "upstamped" to cover or secure such additional, further or other  loan(s)/financing, credit or banking facility/facilities.    It is therefore intended that this Agreement shall also govern, and the terms and conditions of this  Agreement shall also apply to, all such additional, further and other loan/financing, credit or  banking facility/facilities as may be offered by the Bank from time to time as mentioned above and  which are accepted by the Borrower.      OPERATIVE PROVISIONS   NOW IT IS HEREBY AGREED AS FOLLOWS:  1 INTERPRETATION  1.1 Definitions  In this Agreement, unless the context otherwise requires or permits:-     "Bank Negara"  : means Bank Negara Malaysia, being the central bank of Malaysia   "Base Rate" : means the rate of interest determined by the Bank from time to time to  be its Base Rate and is subject to change at any time and from time to  time (as required by, and subject to applicable directives, guidelines and  requirements of, Bank Negara) to be used as the reference rate for the  pricing of: (1) such retail loans/financing facilities as prescribed by Bank  Negara from time to time; and  (2) any other loans/financing facilities as may be prescribed or  required by Bank Negara from time to time  "Base Lending Rate" : means the rate of interest determined by the Bank from time to time in  its discretion (subject to applicable directives or guidelines of Bank  Negara on this matter) to be its base lending rate;   "Borrower"  means the person (or where more than one, collectively the persons)  named and described in Section 2 of Schedule 1, and includes his (or  as the case may be, their respective) heirs, personal representatives,  permitted assigns and successors, as the case may be;  "Event of Default" : means any of the events, circumstances or states of affairs described or  mentioned in Clause 17.1(a) to (u);   "Facilities" : (1) means the following collectively:  (a) the loan/financing, credit or banking facility (or where more  than one, collectively the loans/financing, credit or banking  facilities) offered by the Bank in the letter of offer referred to  in Schedule 2;  "Potential Event of  Default" : means any event or circumstance which, with the giving of any notice  and/or the lapse of any period of time and/or any relevant determination  being made, could or would become an Event of Default;  "Security  Documents" : The Letters of Offer, this Agreement, and if applicable, the Assignment,  the Charge, the Power of Attorney, the Guarantee and any other  documents which the Bank may now and from time to time require to  secure the repayment and payment of the Indebtedness;  "Security Party" : The parties executing Security Documents and includes any party or  parties providing or which shall hereafter from time to time provide any  security in favour of the Bank to secure the repayment or payment of the  Indebtedness or any part thereof;    "Stamp Act" : means the Stamp Act, 1949 of Malaysia; and  "this Agreement" : means this Facilities Agreement, and includes: (i) the Schedules to this Agreement;  (ii) the Letters of Offer;  (iii) the written agreements and other documents (if any) referred to  in Clause 2.4,  (iv) any letter or other document issued by the Bank to the Borrower,  or executed by the Borrower and the Bank, from time to time  which is expressed to be supplemental or collateral to this  Agreement or which is executed by the Borrower or entered into  by the Borrower and the Bank pursuant to this Agreement; and (v) any letter or other document issued by the Bank to the Borrower,  or executed by the Borrower and the Bank, from time to time  which amends, supplements or varies this Facilities Agreement  or any of the Schedules to this Agreement or any of the Letters of  Offer or any of the letters or other documents referred to in items  (iii) or (iv) above.   1.2 Interpretation  1.2.1 In this Agreement, unless the context requires otherwise, references to:  * an "authority" includes any regulatory, public or governmental authority, agency,  department or official, state-owned organisation, central bank, government, legislature,  minister, ministry, public or statutory person of any state or country;  * a "consent" or "approval" includes an approval, consent, authorisation, exemption, filing,  licence, order, permission, permit, recording or registration;  * a "directive" includes any present or future directive, guidelines, orders and requirements  of, or made by, any authority (in each case, whether or not having the force of law);  * any "Indebtedness" includes any borrowed moneys and any other debt of any kind and  also includes any obligation (whether as principal or surety or otherwise, joint or several)  to pay any moneys or liabilities (whether present or future, actual or contingent, direct or  indirect, primary or collateral, secured or unsecured);  * any "law" or "laws" includes any common or customary law, constitution, treaty, decree,  judgment, statute, ordinance, enactment, order, rules, regulations, by-laws or other  legislation or legislative measure, in each case of any jurisdiction, and "lawful" and  "unlawful" shall be construed accordingly;  * a "payment" includes repayment where applicable (and "pay" and "payable" shall be  similarly construed);  * "Ringgit Malaysia", "Sen" and "RM" refer to the lawful currency of Malaysia;  * "written" and "in writing" include any means of visible reproduction; and  * "year" means a year reckoned according to the Gregorian calendar year.  1.2.2 In this Agreement, unless the context otherwise requires, words and expressions (including those  defined in Clause 1.1 above and those referred to in Clause 1.2.1):  (a) denoting or importing the singular include the plural and vice versa;   (b) denoting or importing the masculine gender include the female and neuter genders and  vice versa; and  (c) denoting or applicable to a natural person include a firm, partnership (whether  incorporated or unincorporated), company, corporation or other body corporate, registered  society, co-operative society, statutory body, local authority, state, trade union, trust,  association, organisation and any other body of persons, whether corporate or  unincorporate (in each case, whether or not a separate legal entity).  1.2.3 In this Agreement:   (a) the words "including" and "in particular" are to be construed as being by way of illustration  or an example or emphasis only, and are not to be construed as, nor shall they take effect  as, limiting the generality of any foregoing words; and   (d) references to any statute is a reference to such statute as from time to time amended,  modified, consolidated, re-certified or re-enacted, and also includes all rules, regulations,  orders, statutory instruments, guidelines and other subsidiary legislation made pursuant to  such statute from time to time in force.  1.2.4 Any reference in this Agreement to something having a "material adverse effect" on the Borrower  or any Security Party is a reference to it having a material adverse effect:  (a) on his condition (financial or otherwise), affairs (including but not limited to, his assets,  business, operations, legal position or revenue) or prospects, or his creditworthiness or  credit rating, or his ability to punctually pay his debts as and when they fall due; or   (b) on his ability to duly and fully perform and comply with his obligations under this  Agreement or any Security Document to which he is a party or which is binding on him, or  under any other agreement, document or transaction of any kind or nature at any time  made between him and the Bank.  1.2.5 Unless prohibited by law, no rule of construction shall apply to the disadvantage of the Bank  because it was responsible for the preparation of this Agreement.  1.3 Construction of the term the "Borrower"   1.3.1 Where the "Borrower" consists of two (2) or more persons:   (a) the term "Borrower" wherever used or appearing in this Agreement shall mean all those  persons and where the context requires or permits, means each of them, or depending on  the context, any of them;   (b) all agreements, covenants, undertakings, representations, warranties, terms, conditions  and other obligations in this Agreement which are expressed or implied on the part of the  Borrower or which are to be performed, complied with or observed by the Borrower or  which are otherwise applicable to the Borrower shall be deemed to be made by, and shall  be binding on and enforceable against, all those persons jointly and severally;    (c) each of all those persons shall be bound even if any other of them intended or expressed  to be bound by this Agreement shall not be so bound; and    (d) the Bank may release or discharge any one or more of those persons from all or any of his  obligations or liabilities under this Agreement or may make any arrangement or  composition with any of those persons without releasing the other or others of those  persons or otherwise prejudicing any of the Bank's rights under this Agreement or  otherwise.   1.3.2 Where the Borrower is a company, corporation or other body corporate or a registered society or  co-operative society or other body of persons or organisation which is a separate legal entity, the  provisions of this Agreement which refer to an individual natural person shall be construed to refer  to the Borrower which is such company, corporation or other body corporate or a registered society  or co-operative society or other body of persons or organisation and shall take effect as if the  Borrower were a natural person.   1.3.3 Where the name of the Borrower set out in Section 2 of Schedule 1 is that of a firm, the Borrower  shall include the sole proprietor, or as the case may be, each of the partners, present and future, in  the firm from time to time carrying on business in the name of the firm or under the name in which  the business of the firm is from time to time carried on or continued.  1.4 Headings, Clauses and Schedules   Headings and sub-headings in this Agreement are inserted for convenience of reference only and  shall be ignored in the interpretation or construction of this Agreement. However, the Schedules to  this Agreement are and must be read and construed as essential and integral parts of this  Agreement and must be taken into account in the interpretation or construction of this Agreement.  References in this Agreement to Clauses and Schedules are to be construed as references to  Clauses in and the Schedules to this Agreement unless otherwise stated.    2 THE FACILITIES & THE LETTERS OF OFFER  2.1 Agreement to make available or continue to make available the Facilities  At the request of the Borrower, the Bank agrees to make available and or continue to make  available (as the case may be) the Facilities to the Borrower on the terms and subject to the  conditions of the Letters of Offer and this Agreement.   2.2 Incorporation of Letters of Offer    The Letters of Offer are deemed to form part of this Agreement, and the provisions of the Letters of  Offer are deemed as incorporated in this Agreement with such changes only as necessary to make  the provisions of the Letters of Offer consistent with the provisions of this Agreement.   2.3 Conflict or inconsistency between any Letter of Offer and this Agreement   If there is any conflict or inconsistency between any Letter of Offer and this Agreement, then unless  otherwise provided in this Agreement, that Letter of Offer shall prevail and supersede the  conflicting or inconsistent provision(s) of this Agreement but only to the extent of the conflict or  inconsistency.   2.4 Specific Agreement or Arrangement relating to each or any Facility   Each Facility may also be further subject to any specific arrangement between the Bank and the  Borrower, or any specific terms as may be prescribed or required by the Bank, as set out in any  separate written agreement(s) and/or other document(s) (in each case, in the Bank's standard form  prescribed by it from time to time) now or from time to time in the future signed or executed by the  Borrower in favour of the Bank or executed by both parties. These separate written agreements  and other documents are to be treated as supplemental to this Agreement.    3 PURPOSE, AVAILABILITY & DRAWDOWN/DISBURSEMENT  3.1 Purpose  The Borrower must use the Facility only for its purposes stated or mentioned in the Letter of Offer  (or such other purpose as the Bank may permit or agree in its absolute discretion).  The Bank is  under no obligation to ensure that the Borrower actually uses the Facility for its stated or permitted  purpose   3.2 Conditions Precedent to Availability of Facilities   3.2.1 The Bank is not obliged to make the Facilities available to the Borrower unless the Bank is satisfied  that the Conditions Precedent have first been duly complied with or fulfilled.   3.2.2 The Borrower acknowledges and accepts that all Conditions Precedent are for the sole benefit of  the Bank, and that as such, the Bank may waive any one or more of them if it thinks fit in its  discretion but without prejudice to the Bank's right to require the Borrower at any later time to  comply with or fulfil any Conditions Precedent as may have been waived by the Bank.  3.3 Availability Period   3.3.1 Subject to Clause 3.2, each Facility may be drawndown, disbursed or utilised only during its  Availability Period.   3.3.2 The Availability Period for each Facility is stated in the Letters of Offer, but if not, the Availability  Period for that Facility will be any period as the Bank may permit or agree in its discretion.  3.3.3 Any part of any Facility not drawndown, disbursed or utilised as at the end of its Availability Period  will, unless the Bank in its discretion otherwise agrees in writing, be immediately cancelled by the  Bank. The Bank may charge a cancellation fee for the undrawn, undisbursed or unutilised part of  any Facility which is cancelled.  3.3.4 The Bank may (but is not obliged to) renew or extend the Availability Period for each or any Facility  as it thinks fit in its discretion subject to regulatory requirement. The Bank may impose any fee for  such renewal or extension and/or any additional, further or other terms or conditions as the Bank  thinks fit as a condition(s) for such renewal or extension.  3.4 Drawdown/Disbursement/Utilisation of Facilities  3.4.1 In addition and without prejudice to Clause 3.2, each drawdown, disbursement or utilisation of or  under each Facility is further subject to and conditional upon the drawdown/pre-disbursement/pre- utilisation conditions set out or mentioned in paragraphs (a) to (c) below having first been complied  with or fulfilled:-   (a) the Bank is satisfied that the additional or specific drawdown/pre-disbursement/pre- utilisation conditions (if any) stated in the relevant Letter(s) of Offer as applicable to each  drawdown, disbursement or utilisation of or under that Facility have first been complied  with or fulfilled to the satisfaction of the Bank;    (b) the Bank is satisfied that:      (i) no Event of Default or Potential Event of Default has occurred on or before the  proposed date of each drawdown, disbursement or utilisation of or under that  Facility or will occur as a result of such drawdown, disbursement or utilisation,  other than any waived by the Bank in writing; and    (ii) no extraordinary circumstances or change of law or governmental action has  arisen, occurred or taken place on or before the proposed date of each  drawdown, disbursement or utilisation of or under that Facility which in the  opinion of the Bank has or might have a material adverse effect on the Borrower  or any of the Security Parties; and    (iii) no change in, or any development of, national or international monetary,  financial, political or economic conditions has taken place on or before the  proposed date of each drawdown, disbursement or utilisation of or under that  Facility which in the opinion of the Bank is material and might or would or is likely  to materially and adversely affect the Bank's commitment to make available or  continue to make available that Facility; and    (c) the Bank has received and found satisfactory all those additional information, legal  opinions and/or other documents as may be requested by the Bank in its discretion before  the proposed date for each drawdown, disbursement or utilisation of or under that Facility  because of:    (i) any change in the condition (financial or otherwise, including but not limited to the  ability of the Borrower or any Security Party to punctually pay his debts as and  when they fall due), legal position, credit rating, creditworthiness, assets,  business, operations, revenue, liabilities, status, prospects or other affairs of or  relating to the Borrower or any Security Party, since the Borrower first applied for  that Facility or which comes to the attention of the Bank after the signing of this  Agreement or the date of the Letter of Offer relating to that Facility (whichever is  later); or     (ii) any information on or relating to the Borrower or any Security Party, or the  condition (financial or otherwise, including but not limited to the ability of the  Borrower or any Security Party to punctually pay his debts as and when they fall  due), legal position, credit rating, creditworthiness, assets, business, operations,  revenue, liabilities, prospects or other affairs of the Borrower or any Security  Party, received by the Bank or which otherwise comes to the attention of the Bank  after the date of the Letter of Offer relating to that Facility or the signing of this  Agreement (whichever is later).   The Borrower acknowledges and accepts that all the drawdown/pre-disbursement/pre-utilisation  conditions set out or mentioned above are for the sole benefit of the Bank, and that as such, the  Bank may waive any one or more of them if it thinks fit in its discretion.   3.4.2 Subject to Clauses 3.2, 3.3 and 3.4.1, each Facility may be drawndown, disbursed or utilised in  such manner, at such time or times and subject to such conditions and contingencies stated or  mentioned in the relevant Letter(s) of Offer, but if not, in such manner, at such time or times and  subject to such conditions and contingencies as the Bank may from time to time decide or allow in  its discretion.   3.5 Authorisation To Pay On Behalf   The Bank shall be at liberty and is hereby expressly authorised by the Borrower to give such  undertakings or release, advance or pay the whole of the Facilities or such part or parts thereof to  or in favour of any person as may be entitled thereto or on behalf to any vendor, developer, builder,  architect, contractor or the existing chargee of the property, or to any financial institution or other  person having an interest in the property or any of the aforesaid persons' representatives by one  lump sum or progressively or otherwise at such times in such manner for such amounts and upon  such contingencies and conditions in accordance with such undertakings which the Bank may give  or require from such parties as the Bank may at its discretion deem expedient. It is hereby agreed  that such express authorisation as aforesaid shall be irrevocable and it is hereby expressly  acknowledged, agreed and confirmed by the Borrower that all amounts so paid shall be deemed to  form part of the Facilities made hereunder and the acknowledgement or receipt of the aforesaid  parties shall be deemed as if the same had been made or given by the Borrower personally and it  is hereby further irrevocably agreed and confirmed by the Borrower that the Borrower shall not be  entitled to object to or restrain such payment by the Bank once the undertaking stated herein has  been given by the Bank.   3.6 No obligation to make further advances, etc   Regardless of whatever else stated, mentioned or implied in this Agreement or any Letter of Offer,  the Bank has no obligation to make available or continue to make available the Facilities (or any of  them or any part of any of them) to the Borrower or otherwise, or to lend or advance any sum or  sums of moneys under the Facilities (or any of them) or otherwise, to or for the benefit of the  Borrower or otherwise, and nothing in this Agreement or any Letter of Offer is to be read or taken to  mean that the Bank has any such obligation, whether in law or equity.   4 INTEREST   4.1 Interest   4.1.1 Calculation: The Borrower must pay interest on all principal sums of moneys lent or advanced by  the Bank to the Borrower or otherwise owing or payable by the Borrower to the Bank under each  Facility. Such interest will, except where otherwise provided in this Agreement or decided by the  Bank pursuant to this Agreement, be calculated (as well after as before any court order or  judgment and even if the banker-customer relationship between the Bank and the Borrower has  ceased or been terminated):   (a) at the prescribed interest rate for that Facility stated in the relevant Letter of Offer, or if not  stated in the relevant Letter of Offer, at such interest rate for that Facility as may be  prescribed by the Bank in its discretion from time to time;    (b) with daily or monthly or other rest periods stated in the Letter of Offer, or if not stated in the  relevant Letter of Offer, with such rest periods as the Bank may from time to time decide in  its discretion; and   (c) in accordance with the Bank's usual practice from time to time or otherwise in such  manner as the Bank may from time to time decide, having regard to, amongst other things,  the nature of that Facility.   4.1.2 Payment: Unless otherwise stated in the relevant Letter of Offer or unless the Bank otherwise  decides or requires, interest payable by the Borrower under each Facility will be debited to the  Borrower's account at the end of every calendar month and will be deemed as immediately due to  the Bank, and must be paid to the Bank monthly in arrears on the first day of every calendar month.   4.2 Additional interest for late payment   4.2.1 Calculation: If the Borrower does not pay any sum of moneys (whether a loan repayment  instalment, principal sum, interest or otherwise) payable by him under this Agreement when due,  he must pay additional interest for late payment of the overdue amount. Such additional interest  will, except where otherwise provided in this Agreement, be calculated on the overdue amount (as  well after as before any court order or judgment and even if the banker-customer relationship  between the Bank and the Borrower is terminated or has ceased):   (a) at the rate (if any) stated in the relevant Letter of Offer for late payment, or if not stated in  the relevant Letter of Offer, at such rate as the Bank may in its absolute discretion decide  for this purpose; and    (b) in accordance with the Bank's usual practice from time to time or otherwise in such  manner as the Bank may from time to time decide, having regard to, amongst other things,  the nature of that Facility and the overdue amount.  4.2.2 Payment: Unless otherwise stated in the relevant Letter of Offer or unless otherwise required by  the Bank, additional interest payable by the Borrower for late payment of overdue amounts will be  debited to the Borrower's account at the end of every calendar month and will be deemed as  immediately due to the Bank, and must be paid to the Bank immediately when due.   4.3 Increased interest rate for delinquent or non-performing accounts   If any sum of moneys (whether a loan repayment instalment, principal sum, interest or otherwise)  payable by the Borrower to the Bank under any Facility (or any part of such sum) is not paid when  due and remains overdue for more than the period (if any) stated in the relevant Letter of Offer (or if  not stated in the relevant Letter of Offer, a period of sixty (60) days or any other period as the Bank  may from time to time decide in its discretion), then regardless of any other provision in this  Agreement or any Letter of Offer, the prescribed interest rate for that Facility will immediately and  automatically on expiry of such period, and with notice to the Borrower, be increased to the higher  prescribed interest rate for that Facility stated in the relevant Letter of Offer as applicable in these  circumstances (or if not stated in the relevant Letter of Offer, at any higher interest rate as the Bank  may in its absolute discretion decide for this purpose). This higher interest rate will be applicable as  well after as before any court order or judgment and even if the banker-customer relationship  between the Bank and the Borrower is terminated or has ceased.  4.4 Interest rate on termination/recall of Facility or demand for immediate payment.    If any Facility is terminated, recalled or cancelled by the Bank pursuant to any provision of this  Agreement or the Bank makes a demand for payment of all sums of moneys (principal, interest and  otherwise) owing or payable to the Bank under any Facility, the Borrower must pay the Bank  default interest on all sums of moneys (principal, interest and otherwise, actual and contingent)  outstanding or owing to the Bank under that Facility. Such default interest will be calculated (as  well after as before any court order or judgment and even if the banker-customer relationship  between the Bank and the Borrower has been terminated or has ceased):   (a) at the default rate for that Facility stated in the relevant Letter of Offer (or if not stated in  the relevant Letter of Offer, at such default rate as the Bank may in its discretion decide  and impose), or if the Bank thinks fit in its discretion, at the current account excess rate as  from time to time determined by the Bank in its discretion); and   (b) in accordance with the Bank's usual practice from time to time or otherwise in such  manner as the Bank may from time to time decide in its discretion.  4.5 Interest rate on current account overdrawn amounts &
